document.full_text: dozens of people were arrested at a commemoration service saturday for an iranian activist who died at her father's funeral earlier in the week after a scuffle with security forces, an opposition website reported.
document.title: "dozens arrested" at service for iran activist: report
lines_and_colors: dozens of people were arrested at a commemoration service saturday for an iranian activist who died at her father's funeral earlier in the week after a scuffle with security forces, an opposition website reported.
